headline: Extinction Rebellion: charges against five protesters dismissed
trail: Judge says ‘abject failure’ by CPS left case lacking key prosecution witness as police officer goes on holiday

headline: Nightmares on wax: the environmental impact of the vinyl revival
trail: From toxic wastewater to greenhouse gas emissions, the boom in vinyl has dangerous effects – but streaming isn’t as clean an alternative as it looks

headline: The Spin | Drought in southern Africa means cricket must look hard in the mirror
trail: ‘I’m being sacrilegious but we need to look at artificial surfaces,’ says the Wanderers groundsman, Evan Flint, amid climate crisis

headline: Africa is humanitarian 'blind spot': the world's top 10 forgotten crises – report
trail: Climate emergency is fuelling drought, food poverty and disaster in the global south but humanitarian crises under-reported

headline: How the 'Venice of Africa' is losing its battle against the rising ocean
trail: Saint-Louis, the old colonial capital of Senegal, faces a flooding threat that has already seen entire villages lost to the Atlantic

headline: Greyhound cuts ties with Adani mine after backlash from climate activists
trail: The bus company faced a boycott from opponents of the Carmichael coalmine after signing a contract with a firm building a railway for the project

headline: Hundreds of workers defy Amazon rules to protest company's climate failures
trail: Employees ‘needed to stand up for what’s right’ despite policy barring workers from speaking about business

headline: Sainsbury's in £1bn investment to become carbon neutral by 2040
trail: Retailer’s plans include cutting down on waste and a plastic bottle deposit scheme

headline: UK must create 120,000 green energy jobs by 2030 to meet targets
trail: National Grid report says target needs to be met if projects to cut greenhouse gas emissions are to go ahead
